tool_description: Our secure SMS API is the only tool you'll need to schedule, send and receive messages from your existing systems. It's robust too - even the most demanding applications see high message throughputs using our API.
name: Reach Interactive
title: Reach Interactive

api_list.name: Message Send
api_list.description: Creates a new message object. We return an array of each Id generated. Per request, a max of 50 recipients can be entered.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://reach-interactive.p.rapidapi.com/sms/message"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "reach-interactive.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://reach-interactive.p.rapidapi.com/sms/message"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "reach-interactive.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
